main_definition: The act of sending written messages using electronic devices or the collection of such messages.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Sending a written message via phone call
meanings_and_examples.example: He didn't like getting texts; he preferred to speak on the phone.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A series of electronic messages sent back and forth between two or more people
meanings_and_examples.example: They exchanged texts all day until they finally met up in person.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Writing a text message, typically using abbreviations and informal language
meanings_and_examples.example: I'll see you at the party. Texts me if you change your mind.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Text messaging service provided by mobile phone operators
meanings_and_examples.example: To send or receive texts, I need to sign up for a texting plan with my carrier.
